sn22.127:4.1: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were staying near Benares, in the deer park at Isipatana. …
sn22.127:4.4: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘ignorance’.
sn22.127:4.6: And how is an ignorant person defined?”
sn22.127:5.1: “Reverend, it’s when an uneducated ordinary person doesn’t truly understand form, which is liable to originate …
sn22.127:5.3: liable to originate and vanish, as form which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.127:5.11: consciousness, which is liable to originate … liable to vanish … liable to originate and vanish, as consciousness which is liable to originate and vanish.
sn22.127:5.14: And this is how an ignorant person is defined.”
